dublin_core.dcvalue: Telemedicine or the delivery of health care from a distance is an exciting field that has undergone rapid advancements over the past three decades Previous studies have demonstrated that telemedicine can effectively assist in patient care However cost issues and the lack of resources to sustain telemedicine systems have previously limited the use of this technology Herein we explore the development current applications and future of telemedicine
Telemedicine: recent developments and future applications.
